item.title: Bricks dumped on road, 14th October
item.description:
The same issue was reported around 4 weeks ago multiple times and was ignored by the council. This waste is blocking the road and making it difficult for cars to pass each other.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Dyne Road, London

item.category: Fly-tip Large - More than a van load

item.title: 3rd CAR PARK Full of leaves, 14th October
item.description:

item.title: 11 holes dug around telephone pole, lamp post and rectangular cover on a grass verge, 14th October
item.description:
Foxes have been continuously digging around the telephone poll, lamp post and rectangular cover on a grass verge for many months. We see them most night around that area. In total, there are 11 holes dug up and some are very deep. I am worried that the post and pole will fall as the foundation are weak. They also keep fouling all around that area.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 23, Blenheim Road, Albany Park, Sidcup, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree roots lifting pavement, 14th October
item.description:
Tree outside 21 Celandine drive, tree roots lifting paving slabs, old gentleman tripped and fell today as he was crossing the road, ambulance called and he was taken to hospital
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Celandine Drive, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
